name: A Book Full of Cards (sei556)
description:
Welcome to "A Book Full of Cards"!

If you like making decisions and building strategies, this game is probably for you! 

This game was created as a uni project at the h_da Darmstadt/Dieburg.

STORY:

You play as the teenage girl Melissa - a girl without friends or any remarkable social skills. One day, she finds a weird looking book along with some blank playing cards in her attic. Later they reveal themselves to be "magical objects" that can alter her future.

Can Melissa finally find friends? Are the books powers real? Find out yourself!

HOW TO PLAY:

You have to click the Event card in the middle of the screen.

At the bottom you can see your resource cards. The Options revealed by the Event will tell you how they affect your resources and game. No text means no effect.

Your goal is to befriend with the selcted Characters (Character selection get's unlocked after playing the tutorial)

You will have to make the right decisions to proceed in befrieding the characters and you need certain resources to fulfill  their final task.

If you have more than 8+ Resource Cards, 4+ Guilt (red cards) or no Energy(green cards), you will encounter special bad events. Those events should be avoided under all circumstances as they can knock you out of the game easily.
